attributes.action: order the IND to remove the nationality and right to abode in the UK of those British athletes who sign-up to the undertaking not to criticise the Chinese record on human rights and, at the same time disenfranchise any British athletes who do sign the undertaking so that they participate only as individuals and NOT as representatives of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: China is obviously worried and is attempting to impose conditions upon participants in a Global event which should have no conditions attached to it.  If the Chinese are not happy to have people coming and going AND talking freely then they should not have put themselves forward to host the Olympic Games.  If the Chinese authorities do not withdraw this requirement the games should be boycotted.
